NorwegianStemmer.methodObject = new NorwegianStemmer();

NorwegianStemmer.a_0 = [
  new Among('a', -1, 1),
  new Among('e', -1, 1),
  new Among('ede', 1, 1),
  new Among('ande', 1, 1),
  new Among('ende', 1, 1),
  new Among('ane', 1, 1),
  new Among('ene', 1, 1),

NorwegianStemmer.a_2 = [
  new Among('leg', -1, 1),
  new Among('eleg', 0, 1),
  new Among('ig', -1, 1),
  new Among('eig', 2, 1),
  new Among('lig', 2, 1),
